p: γ-Terpinene is an antioxidant [ 176]. It is neither irritating nor sensitizing [ 167]. It possesses minimal toxicity. Depending on concentration, it may be mutagenic or non-mutagenic [ 8]. The acute dermal LD 50 of γ-terpinene was >5 g/kg in rabbits, while the acute oral LD 50 was 3.65 g/kg in rats [ 167].
